spillTops

public OutputFile spillTops()
                     throws java.io.IOException
this need to be improved. we should emit the top records by doing spill only when we got some new higher priority KVs, if no updated new higher priority KVs, then we don't need to emit. If we have a lot of new higher KVs, we can emit some part of higher ones. while if we have a small number of new higher KVs, we emit them all.

Parameters:
stop -
Returns:
Throws:
java.io.IOException
